StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPackageMetaData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @SSN varchar(11) ) AS
SELECT app.[PackageId], per.[SSN], per.[FirstName], per.[LastName], per.[MaidenName], per.[MiddleName], per.[Su.x], CASE app.[Gender] WHEN 1 THEN 'M' WHEN 2 THEN 'F' END as [Gender], pac.[UploadedBy], pac.[DateUploaded], pac.[Locked], pac.[LockedBy], pac.[DateLocked] FROM [ACP].[Person] per INNER JOIN [ACP].[Applicant]app ON per.[PersonId] = app.[PersonId] INNER JOIN [ACP].[Package] pac ON app.[PackageId] = pac.[PackageId] WHERE replace(@SSN, '-', '') = replace(per.[SSN], '-', '')
